channel.title: Sad Moon - Hern [Experimental]
channel.description:
New single from my upcoming project, *Reflection.* I mostly sampled myself playing guitar on this one, though there are some samples from other sources.
Link is here: https://soundcloud.com/hernmusicofficial/sad-moon-1?ref=clipboard&p=i&c=1
Hope you enjoy. Please leave some constructive criticism is you have any.
